data.name: ADDC - App Design & Development Conference
data.description: Single-track international conference for iOS & Android designers and developers in Barcelona, Spain. App designers and developers around the world work side by side every day to build some of the most incredible and innovative applications. Yet our potential for synergy is so often overlooked. data.name: iOSDevUK
data.description: iOSDevUK started in 2011 as the UK’s first conference for iPhone developers, and has attracted hundreds of developers to Aberystwyth each year since then. It runs from 4pm on Monday until 1pm on Thursday, followed by an optional Hack. It is very much a community event, with a broad range of spea…
